channel.title: Bad Days on Ghostdogs
channel.description: Recent content in Bad Days on Ghostdogs

item.title: Bad Days
item.description: Looking after Tam and myself can be tough. Over the past few days it has been really tough. Yesterday Tam was sick. Nothing he had eaten that I can blame but he kept purging for hours and it became too much. I pleaded with him to go to bed and rest as I was not coping.
